Fantasy Fashion - Amazonian Torso
kDesc
She is power, she is beauty, she is passion. Be warned however, to ignore her threat is to welcome destruction. [#Legal]
Elle possède la force, elle possède la beauté, elle possède la passion. Mais soyez sur vos gardes : ignorer la menace qu'elle représente revient à s'exposer à l'anéantissement. [#Legal]
Sie ist kraftvoll und wunderschön. Sie ist pure Leidenschaft. Doch Vorsicht … Ihre Gefährlichkeit zu ignorieren, bedeutet, der Zerstörung zu huldigen. [#Legal]
Potere, bellezza e passione. Ma fai attenzione, ignorare le sue minacce significa aprire le porte alla distruzione. [#Legal]
Ella representa el poder, la belleza y la pasión. Pero ten cuidado, si ignoras su amenaza, estarás cavando tu propia tumba. [#Legal]
She is power, she is beauty, she is passion. Be warned however, to ignore her threat is to welcome destruction. [#Legal]
그녀는 힘 그 자체이며, 또한 아름답습니다. 그녀는 또한 열정입니다. 그러나 조심하십시오. 그녀의 경고를 무시하면 파멸을 맞게 됩니다.[#Legal]
She is power, she is beauty, she is passion. Be warned however, to ignore her threat is to welcome destruction. [#Legal]
她是力量、美麗、熱情的化身。要注意！忽視她的威脅就等於迎向滅亡。 [#Legal]
她是力量、美麗、熱情的化身。要注意！忽視她的威脅就等於迎向滅亡。 [#Legal]
